page.title: 19 A Day in My Life
page.content:
My name is Steven Rodriguez. I am 8 years old. This is what I did on a recent schoolday.
I got up at 8 o'clock and had my breakfast. I had Weetabix with milk. Then just before 9 o'clock I set off for school. School starts at 8.55. Our teacher took the register and then we did some{writing}called "Sound Sense". The morning playtime is from 10.30 until 10.50. I played{football. After play, until 12.00 we did{maths. At 12.00 it is dinner time. I went home for my dinner. My mother had made chicken pie with carrots and gravy. I read my comics and played until 1.15 and then it was time to go back to {school.}Afternoon{school}starts at 1.25. In the afternoon we did some more school work. {Continued on page 20
